welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Stabroek, the charming city known for its picturesque streets and vibrant culture. We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to explore all that our beautiful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Woensdrecht Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Woensdrecht Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for commercial flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Zoersel Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gilze-Rijen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access the WiFi network for free for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and regional flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
